title: Rotational inertia - cylinder rotating four axes

content.question: A uniformly dense cylinder can rotate about any of four axes, as shown. The cylinder has radius <math alttext="r" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>r</mi></math> and length <math alttext="L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>L</mi></math>, where <math alttext="r is much less than L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>r</mi><mo>â‰ª</mo><mi>L</mi></math>. About which axis does the cylinder have the greatest rotational inertia?

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
